descriptionlist.description:
Updated for iOS 12 and 13

Description:
"Add a different image to each SpringBoard Screen! If you use the right images you can create a Panorama Background Effect that Apple removed from the iPhone. Configure options on settings - supports up to 10 screens!

This tweak will not work if you use a dynamic or live wallpaper

If your images do not show, try setting your wallpaper to a stock wallpaper in Settings->Wallpapers->Stills. Then set your images and respring.

Configure options from Settings "
